item.title: Boost American Shipbuilding and the Power of the U.S. Navy
item.description: The security of this great nation (and dozens of allies) is at stake.

item.title: Ben-Hur Is a Christmas Book
item.description: The movie is more suitable for Easter, but Lew Wallace’s novel is more about the Incarnation and people’s responses to it.

item.title: It’s Not a Wonderful Remake
item.description: It Happened One Christmas may retain much of the thematic import and help remind people of Frank Capra’s Christmas classic, but it is otherwise best f...

item.title: Student Terrorism
item.description: Recent events at George Mason University show that student protesters are going further than just admiring terrorists.

item.title: Joe Biden’s Commutations Racket
item.description: Biden, or whoever is running the White House, should be ashamed.
